First implementation, functional. Only 2 lines of code.

timeline.bodyText: Perhaps the preference key could be improved: I would not call this a "tool panel". Perhaps just ui.leftPanelWidth?

replies.bodyText:
Yes @wetneb, this pref name could be better but what if we have another preference to put tools panel on the right instead of the left?
Left and right would then be inverted.
Regards,
